channel.title: American Hockey League on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in American Hockey League on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Lehigh Valley Phantoms Logo
The Lehigh Valley Phantoms are a professional ice hockey team in the American Hockey League based at the PPL Center in Allentown, Pennsylvania, a core city of the Lehigh Valley. The Phantoms franchise has been the top minor league affiliate for the NHL’s Philadelphia Flyers since the 1996–97 season, previously playing in Philadelphia as the Philadelphia Phantoms until 2009, and in Glens Falls, New York, as the Adirondack Phantoms until 2014.
You can download theLehigh Valley Phantomslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Lehigh Valley Phantoms
item.description: The Lehigh Valley Phantoms are a professional ice hockey team in the American Hockey League based at the PPL Center in Allentown, Pennsylvania, a core city of the Lehigh Valley. The Phantoms franchise has been the top minor league affiliate for the NHL’s Philadelphia Flyers since the 1996–97 season, previously playing in Philadelphia as the Philadelphia Phantoms until 2009, and in Glens Falls, New York, as the Adirondack Phantoms until 2014.
